casebody.data:
Harold Bright HARRIS, Jr.
v.
DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY, Division of Adult Prisons; Lawrence Parsons. No. 349P12-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 30, 2015. Anita LeVeaux, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Harold Bright Harris, Jr., for Harris, Harold Bright, Jr.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 23rd of November 2015 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Forsyth County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of November 2015."
ERVIN, J. recused.
